items.title: Fried Salmon Special
items.description: A deliciously crispy fried salmon fillet served with a tangy lemon butter sauce, complemented by a side of garlic mashed potatoes and steamed vegetables. Perfect for seafood lovers looking for a flavorful meal.

items.title: Grilled Chicken with Mango Salsa
items.description: Juicy grilled chicken breast topped with a refreshing mango salsa, served with coconut rice and a fresh garden salad. A delightful blend of sweet and savory flavors.

items.title: Choco Ice Cream Sandwich
items.description: Indulge in our rich chocolate ice cream sandwiched between two freshly baked chocolate chip cookies. A perfect treat for chocolate lovers.

items.title: Lemon Cheesecake
items.description: A creamy lemon cheesecake with a buttery graham cracker crust, topped with a tangy lemon curd and fresh berries. A refreshing end to any meal.

items.title: Mixed Buffet
items.description: An extensive buffet featuring a variety of dishes including succulent roast meats, fresh seafood, vibrant salads, and an assortment of desserts. Perfect for those who want to try a little bit of everything.

items.title: Vegetarian Delight Buffet
items.description: A buffet brimming with a variety of vegetarian options including grilled vegetables, savory pastas, hearty soups, and a selection of plant-based desserts. Ideal for vegetarians and health-conscious diners.
